basics.name: Collin Lefeber
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: A hard working human. Always looking to learn and improve.

work.summary: Full stack engineer with focus on Vimeo On Demand
highlights: Part a smaller (~6 people) but efficient On Demand team. Good experience with inter-team planning and suport
Built numerous features for public facing On Demand users as well as private customer and staff facing tools
Experience with a highly visible, large scale application and large multi month projects
Was part of the hiring process for numerous new employees (across deparments), now manage one direct report

work.summary: Full stack, building new features and maintaining an E-Discovery application.
highlights: Work on a ~10 person development team along with other departments (QA, DB, Support)
Daily activities span many different areas throughout the stack, from building ajax driven tools with PrototypeJS to Oracle database patches, PL/SQL packages and table design
Ample Experience in high stress time sensitive situations.
Member of our Review Team. Responsible for reviewing the code of other team members before their changes are accepted.

volunteer.summary: Built and still host a Sushi resturaunt homepage
